column1: nice and full, slanting in on middle, Tamim presses forward and blocks wide of short leg under the helmet
pitched up on middle, forward and patted down to mid-on
back of a length and zipping through the channel, excellent carry through to the keeper, as Tamim tucks his bat inside the line and lets it go
in-between length and seaming away against the angle, ignored outside off
much fuller and holds its line outside off, Tamim stretches forward, but does not meet the pitch. He prods at it, does so with soft hands, ensuring the nick does not carry to second slip
full inducker, comes back in after pitching outside off, Tamim camps back and manages an inside edge onto the pad
banged in short on middle, Liton sinks under it
on a length and outside off, Liton chases it and edges between slips and gully for a fortunate four
back of a length and nipping in from outside off, catches the pad and lobs in front of the keeper
leg-side ball, deflected off the pads to square leg
Gabriel rounds out the over with a gem of a ball. He ventures wide of the crease, angles it in towards off stump and then gets it to straighten away past the outside edge
short and darted at the body, Tamim rides the bounce and fends it off to fine leg
perfectly-pitched ball, angling in, making the batsman play for the angle and then nipping away in the corridor
good length and angling into a push to cover
back of a length and outside off, no shot
Roach brings this one in from wide of the crease, chops the batsman into half, and snakes past Liton's inside edge
pitched up on off, forward and played back to the bowler with soft hands
Tamim inches forward, opens the face, and dabs a full ball between point and cover for one
back of a length and angling into a back-foot defence
gets forward and punches a length ball to the covers does Liton
back of a length and holds its line outside off, run away to backward point
Gabriel hits that hard length and cramps the batsman for room, fended in the air but to the right of forward short leg
full and straight, gently worked through midwicket
pitched up and holds its line outside off, Liton presses forward, covers his off stump, lets it pass
Liton aims for the cover drive but this full ball does not come on. The result's an inside edge that wanders away to the leg side
Tamim stretches forward to block this full ball on off back to the bowler
extra bounce from a back of a length, Tamim splices it to the right of short leg
full and wide outside off - wider than a set of stumps - left alone in the channel

Roach has Tamim nicking off to the keeper. Good length, angling in from wide of the crease, from around the stumps, seams away just enough to find the outside edge. Tamim was squared up, poking at it, simple catch for Dowrich behind the stumps. Just reward for discipline with the new ball. Well done, Roach
dug in short and outside off, Liton camps back and drags a pull through square leg
lifter outside off, Liton has his eyes locked on the ball before ducking under it
on a length and outside off, driven on the up to the left of short cover
good length, angling in, holds its line to beat the outside edge
full and angling in at off, played back down the pitch
Mominul opens the face and drives a single through cover-point to get off the mark
chipped in the air but to the right of Bishoo at short midwicket. Liton is a bit too early on the flick, the ball isn't coming onto the bat on this pitch
jabbed into the covers
good length on middle, blocked to the leg side
extra bounce from a length outside off, Mominul judges it well, loosens his grip and fends it to the cordon

Two wickets in two overs for Roach. But, oooh, he's clutching the back of his right knee. Pitched up further outside off, Mominul searches for a drive and drives away from the body. The resultant outside edge is smartly pouched at gully by Hope
pretty full on off, squeezes a drive down the ground straight of mid-on for one
back of a length, angling in, Gabriel coaxes Liton into playing the angle, but the ball nips away late and beats the outside edge. WI quicks are threatening both edges
full and outside off, curves away further. Liton chases a drive and almost nicks it off
good length and holds its line outside off, Liton tightens up and leaves it be
good length and angling in at off, forward and played back to Gabriel. Much better from Liton
Liton wafts and misses a length ball on a sixth-stump line outside off
Mushfiqur reads an outswinger and lets it go outside off

Three in three overs for Roach. Given lbw by umpire Kettleborough. This looks pretty adjacent but Mushfiqur challenges the on-field out decision. Roach ventures wide of the crease, slanting in towards off stump, beats the inside edge and pings the front pad on the knee-roll. The tracker returns umpire's call on off. It would have cannoned into middle stump. Buh-bye Mushfiqur
low full-toss outside off, bunted to short cover

Roach, you beauty! He takes down Mushfiqur and Shakib in a space of three balls. He hobbles away and celebrates. Good length and seams away just a shade outside off, Shakib spars at it and edges it to second slip Shakib can't shake Bangladesh out of their funk, at least for now

Five-wicket haul for Roach, inside nine overs. Mahmudullah also goes for a duck. Roach is on a hat-trick. Cracking delivery. Good length, angling in from wide of the crease, at off stump, then straightens away. Mahmudullah is squared up as he nicks it behind to Dowrich. Roach, on one leg, is on fayaaaaah in North Sound
full inswinger, finishes on the pads, chipped in the air to the right of short midwicket. Yes, Nurul averts the hat-trick
short and dug down leg, left alone. Re-set the radar, Shannon
full and angling in, chipped in the air but nobody at mid-on to pouch it
pitched up on a fifth-stump line, drags the batsman into a drive and goes past the outside edge
full and swings away wide outside off, Liton chases a drive and does not make contact. Another loose drive
back of a length and zipping away outside off, Liton chases it again and is beaten on the outside edge again
pitched further up on a fourth-stump line, Liton reaches out for a drive without moving his front foot towards the pitch of the ball. The ball runs past the outside edge
lovely outswinger outside off, Nurul plays inside the line and lets it go
good length and angling into middle, quietly tucked away to fine leg for one
good length and largely holds its line outside off, ignored
full on a fifth-stump line, hint of outswing, left alone
good length and moves away just a shade outside off, no shot
dipping full-toss on middle and leg, tapped away to the right of short midwicket, and that's drinks
length ball in at leg stump. He shoulders arms and it pings off his thigh guard to square leg
beaten. Looks to flash at a full ball outside off with no feet movement at all
outside edge falls short of gully. Length ball rises up in the corridor and he jabs at it. Lobs up at the fielder
slices the pull and gets it to the midwicket boundary. Dropped short outside off and he looks to go up from under it. Not timed very well, but it's wide open spaces there. Good shot
driven through the covers with a turning bat. Not to the pitch again, no stride in again. Slashes and gets it through
length ball at off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length just outside off, allows it to come on and caresses it past gully
length outside off, dead-batted into the off side

slogs across the line against a big outswinger. You guessed it - without the front foot stride. As a result, it's another slice. He's counting on the safety of the field being in and it's keeping him safe for now. Chipped over mid-on for two
short of a length on leg stump, hangs deep and nudges it through square leg
beaten. Length ball curves away from the corridor, draws him forward and skids past the outside edge
beaten again. Outswinger further wide than the last one. He stabs again and can't get bat on it
full ball on leg stump, tapped to mid-on off the front foot

another slog attempt and at Test level, you don't get away with repeatedly doing that. Liton survived the new ball and had a good chance to lift his team, but he's ended up skying one for backward point. A terrible shot. It was overpitched and at off stump. He looked to go over midwicket. No attempt to cover the outswing
thuds his back thigh after straightening from a length on off stump and beating the outside edge
beaten. Length ball outside off, jabs at it nervously and is beaten
length ball at off stump, defended off the back foot

taken at third slip. Nurul, with no luck trying to open the face against length balls outside off, decided to close the face on one. It's taken the leading edge and carried. No fuss. It was too far out for him to play that shot
short ball shaping away wide outside off, left alone
short and wide outside off, left alone
length on off stump, slight swing away. Defended off the back foot
full outswinger at off stump, blocked on the front foot
inside edge as he looks to blaze one through the covers without moving his feet. It's a full ball outside off, tempting him to drive
short of a length outside off, zips away and past the outside edge
beats the outside edge after drawing him forward. Gets that to straighten in the corridor
short ball outside off, left alone

is that taken? Yep. Devon Smith has leaped across to his left, in front of first slip, and taken a sharp low catch. Mehidy looking for a big drive again but like the rest of his team today, he has no faith in the front foot stride philosophy. Late swing away from Cummins and the end approaches ever faster
climbs over the stumps as Rubel backs into the leg side to try and defend this back of a length ball
short and wide outside off, left alone
length ball wide outside off, exposes his stumps and hangs the bat out at this
bouncer has him ducking. Gets his head out of the way as it lifts at his right shoulder
off the glove. Short ball in the corridor. Too much for Kamrul. Rising nastily as he looks to defend and it's through to Dowrich

gets bat on his first Test delivery! A fantastic achievement considering he's already batting 90 minutes into is debut. Outswinger curves away from leg stump. He offers the full face and gets a single at mid-on
short of a length and wide outside off. Backs away and looks to hammer through cover. Beaten
toe-endedthrough cover. Once again backs away against a rising delivery and looks to clobber it
length ball lifts up from a leg stump line and hits him on the back leg as he looks to defend
short ball wide outside off. Slashes and can't get bat on it
length ball outside off, crouches and makes room by getting outside leg. Chops it to backward point's right
length ball just outside off. Gets the front leg into the leg side and looks to slice. Beaten
and again. Makes room for a slice and only gets the bat to connect with the ground
heaves and misses. Length ball rising up above the stumps as he tries to make room and blast it over midwicket
shot. Overpitched on middle stump, offers the full face as he gets outside leg stump and drills it past his partner
length ball, swings away too much to draw the edge of a bat that's hanging out there, in the corridor, begging for an edge
swings it too much again, well past the outside edge as he looks to defend
outside edge lands short of third slip. He starts straighter this time, at middle stump. Jayed looks to fend with hard hands as it swings away. Thick outside edge

bowled him. After a lot of flirting around with the outside edge, Holder bowls full at the overly exposed stumps. Swings it away from middle and hits off stump. Bangladesh bowled out before lunch on the first day.
short of a length and very wide outside off. Some swing. Left alone
short of a length outside off, punched through the covers with a high elbow and soft hands
length ball hooping in at leg stump. Gets deep in the crease and whips it to fine leg's left
full and swinging in at leg stump. Looks to flick and gets a pad on it. Nurul leaps a long way down leg side and gets his hands to it
length ball swinging in at off stump. Closes the face too early as he looks to flick with the angle. Gets a leading edge into the off side
full and into the pads again. Getting a lot of movement, but the direction is lacking. Devon Smith flicks to fine leg's right
full outswinger outside off. Jams it it into the turf. Went late at that one
length ball swinging away outside off, left alone
length ball shaping away, very wide outside off. Big forward stride as he leaves this
length ball in the corridor. Late movement away squares him up. He plays with soft hands and gets it to gully off the outside half
length outside off, solidly blocked on the front foot
length ball shaping away outside off, left alone
full inswinger in the corridor. Gets the front foot to the pitch and mistimes a drive past mid-off. The face closed on that, but the body was close enough for the shot
short of a length and in at leg stump. Comfortably jabs it behind square leg off the back foot
tempting outswinger, full and there for the cover drive. Brathwaite happy to leave. Getting a big stride in
length ball in the corridor. Defends it from the crease, under his eyes
length on the pads. Half a stride in to clip this through square leg with soft hands
length ball wide outside off, left alone
Brathwaite gets on top of a shortish ball outside off and punches with an open face to backward point
much fuller and outside off, Brathwaite strides forward and bunts wide of backward point for one
back of a length and angling across off, left alone by Smith
left alone outside off as the ball scuttles through to the keeper
short and climbs on off, fended off to the covers off the back foot
good length and in the corridor, Smith knows where his off stump is and hence lets this one go too
back of a length, starts wide outside off and swings away further, it does not draw a shot from Brathwaite. Too wide
good length and angling in on off, played back
full and outside off, driven back
dug shorter and outside off, no shot
overpitched and outside off, Brathwaite leans into a drive and caresses it straight of mid-off. Gorgeous timing, and that's the first boundary of the innings
closes the face now and drives a length ball from outside off through mid-on
back of a length and swinging down leg, away from the reach of the flick
kicks up from a back of a length outside off and skirts past the top edge as the batsman aims to cut
full, wide, left alone in the corridor
full and swinging away past the outside edge
back of a length on a fourth-stump line, Devon Smith gets behind the line and punches to mid-off
tip and run to the right of short cover to round out the over
full, pitches outside leg and strikes the pad as the batsman falls over the flick. The lbw appeal is shot down
full and swinging into middle, Smith camps back and dead-bats it
swinging down the leg side, Nurul Hasan throws himself to his right to stop the ball
too full and outside off, Smith gets forward and drives it to Jayed's left
nice inswinger, dabbed to midwicket off the front foot
short, wide, left alone
full inswinger, driven through midwicket off the front foot
Rubel bowls it on a length outside off and finds some movement off the pitch to square up Brathwaite and skip past the outside edge
back of a length and outside off, ignored
shorter and outside off, fended back
left alone outside off
pitched up and outside off, driven through the line to extra cover off the front foot
full and nipping away outside off, Smith eyes up the leg side, closes the face and squirts an outside edge past the cordon. Fine bowling from Javed. That's the length, kid
shorter and outside off, tipped to the right of short cover for one
full and nipping away outside off, ignored in the corridor
Brathwaite falls over the flick but this inswinger is heading down the leg side. Not given lbw by the umpire. Bangladesh decide against a review
Brathwaite gets behind a length ball on off and blocks it back to the bowler
Brathwaite leans into a drive and sends the ball from outside off to mid-off
banged in short and attacking the body, Smith swivels on the back foot and controls a hook behind square leg. Nicely played, Smith
back of a length and outside off, stabbed to the left of short cover for a single
short, wide, slapped straight to backward point
Smith presses forward and leaves this outswinger alone outside off
short and skidding back in to cramp the batsman for room, fended back
back of a length on a fourth-stump line, Smith gets behind the ball and punches up to the covers for one
full and sliding into the pads, stabbed away to square leg
pitches outside leg and swings in the air to have the batsman falling over the flick and ping the pad. Not given lbw. Shakib chooses not to review
slapped through the line, gets it in the gap between point and the covers
Smith keeps falling over the flick, and Jayed strikes the pad again but this does not threaten the stumps too
full awayswinger, Smith presses forward and drives to mid-off
full and nipping down leg, left alone
shuffles across and works a length ball to short midwicket
short, angling into the ribs, fended off to the leg side. Well negotiated by Brathwaite
full and angling down the leg side, past the attempted flick
full and angling into the pads, Brathwaite simply tickles it away fine past the keeper for four
worked with the incoming angle to deep square leg. They hare back for the second
inswinging yorker, jammed out to mid-on
short, wide, bounces over the cut. Jayed getting some extra bounce
full and holds its line around off stump, Smith's head falls over to the off side as he inside-edges it onto the front pad
outswinger outside off, left alone in the channel
played back to the bowler off the front foot
back of a length and swings in to catch the thigh pad
full and angling away outside off, steered off the face to gully
arm ball, finishes on leg stump, dead-batted away
full and holds its line on off, played back to the bowler
drifting into the pads, picked away behind square on the leg side
floated up on leg stump, blocked
drift and bounce outside off, fended away just wide of slip
tossed on off, forward and smothered to the off side
full and angling into a push to short midwicket
shorter and angling into a back-foot punch up to mid-off
full and angling into middle and leg, Brathwaite jumps across off stump and blocks the ball to short midwicket
full and angling into off, shooter, kept out
full and holds its line outside off, Brathwaite swishes his bat out of the way
Rubel finds some seam movement to beat the outside edge as Brathwaite simply plays for the incoming angle
short and outside off, gets on top of it and laces a cut to deep point
full and drifts in at off stump, Brathwaite presses forward and jams it onto the pitch
tossed up on off stump, nudged to the left of short cover
flatter and quicker on off, Brathwaite gets right behind the line in defence
on a length and spins away just a wee bit, blocked off the back foot
full and wide, Brathwaite reaches out for the ball and drills it straight to the covers
short on off, hops and fends it off to short midwicket
forward and pressed out to short cover
inducker, inside-edged onto the front pad
short on middle and leg, tucked away to square leg's right
Rubel grunts as he sends down a length ball on off stump, Smith camps back and runs it away to backward point with an open face
Brathwaite hangs back and flicks an arm ball to the leg side for one
shuffles across and defends a slider to short leg
looped up on leg stump, whisked away to short midwicket's left
slides on off stump, Smith defends it to the covers off the front foot
turning into the pads, dead-batted away to the leg side off the back foot
speared outside off, squeezed through the cover-point region
bouncer at the ribs, pulled off the under-edge to fine leg
short of a length and and he gets right on top of the bounce outside off to punch it firmly through the covers
length on off stump, blocked off the back foot
length ball slanted in at the stumps, defended off the back foot
and there's the lead. Length ball outside off. Plants the front leg across and stabs awkwardly at it. It's in the air slightly before rolling past mid-off, to his left. Late call for the single
length on the pads, clipped to fine leg off the front foot
length ball angled in at the stumps. Gets very deep in the crease to defend
length ball wide outside off, left alone
full on off stump, blocked on the front foot
tossed up at off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length and sliding in from outside off. Left alone
full on off stump, blocked on the front foot

top edge lands safely to fine leg's left and trickles into the boundary. Surprised by the bouncer and the pace on it. Rubel slings it in quickly from around the wicket and he can't get a full swing at this with the hook. Poor position for the shot
length outside off, punched on the up to extra cover
short of a length outside off, dropped into the point region off the back foot
length outside off, blocked off the back foot
bouncer dug in too short, flies down leg side and an easy leave
another wasted bouncer. Wayyy down leg side
length outside off, solidly blocked on the front foot
length outside off, blocked
full on leg stump, flicked to mid-on
good length on off stump, dead-batted on the front foot

clubs it wide of mid-on despite not making the pitch of this. But he's close enough to the ball after stepping out. It's only the second session on the first day. There's no spin and so he can drag this length ball away from outside off
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
length ball outside off, left alone. Marginal turn away
tossed up at off, driven to extra cover
tossed up outside off, driven to cover with a full stride
swung away. Clean hit from Smith. Meeets it at the pitch outside off and drills it over mid-on
good length outside off, defended solidly
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
length ball skidding in at leg stump, defended off the back foot
length on middle, pushed to long-on off the front foot
length outside off, defended on the back foot
length on leg stump, tickled fine off the back foot
tossed up outside off, driven wide of mid-off with the turn
poor ball,spanked away. A full toss, very wide. To his credit, he still does the necessary work - leans in on the front foot and punches it away
length ball wide outside off, left alone

dropped! Nurul Hasan has put down an easy chance. Length ball outside off. He loses his discipline and chases it on the front foot. With Kamrul's slingy action, this skids on and takes the outside edge. Nice height for the keeper. He gets behind it, to his left, but can't hold on

a review for lbw. A furious inswinger strikes Smith as he plants the front leg across the stumps for the flick. Head falling over into the off side. Given not out. Shakib reviews...there's no bat on it, but this could be going down leg...yes. It's missing leg stump. Review lost. Kettleborough with the right decision.
overpitched wide outside off, won't chase this time
short of a length and climbing steeply in the corridor. Left alone
length ball slanted in at the pads. Pushed to short leg off the front foot
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
full on leg stump, driven to long-on
length on leg stump, defended into the leg side
length at middle stump, goes deep and blocks
short of a length on leg stump, defended off the back foot
short of a length and flung down leg side. Left alone
short of a length on the hips, flicked to fine leg off the back foot
another full toss outside off. Leans in and taps it on its head. Heavy outfield at deep extra cover stops the ball ten yards inside
length ball on leg stump, flicked to square leg
length ball on off stump, defended to cover on the front foot
length on leg stump, pushed into the leg side off the front foot
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
length, flat, no turn. Off stump. Defended from deep in the crease
length on the pads, tapped to deep backward square off the back foot
good length outside off, blocked on the front foot
full on leg stump, flicked to midwicket's right
tossed up at leg stump. Steps out and flicks to deep midwicket
good length skidder in the corridor, tapped into the covers
length ball outside off, left alone
short of a length outside off, left alone
short of a length in the corridor, some shape back in. Left alone
boom. Smith asserts control with a full-blooded pull. Short ball slanted across him and he slams it through midwicket
short ball again. Stays lower and is closer to him this time. Pulls along the floor to deep square

edge fizzes past second slip and into the boundary. Late away swing for Jayed in the corridor. Smith looking for a cover drive without getting close to the ball. It flew. He dived to his left. But only a third slip fielder could have got hands on that. There isn't one in place.
length ball wide outside off, left alone
length ball outside off, left alone
overpitched and very very wide outside off. Keeper collects in front of second slip
full ball just outside off, driven straight to mid-off
wild late swing away from the batsman again. But once more, it's very very wide outside off.
full outside off, driven to mid-off
yorker outside off, jammed back at the bowler
length ball shaping away outside off, left alone
length ball on middle. Walks into it and tucks it behind square leg to steal a single
short of a length outside off, tapped to point off the back foot. Away from the body there...
short of a length outside off, left alone
length ball wide outside off, left alone
length ball outside off, left alone
length ball outside off, left alone
short and wide outside off, left alone
full ball outside off, pushed to midwicket off the front foot
full outside off, punched back at the bowler off the front foot
full on middle stump, delicately flicked to fine leg's left to pick up two
punched past his partner. Nice balance on the front foot as he gets to the pitch. Denied a boundary as this comes to a stop a few yards in. Nice high elbow from Brathwaite
very full and holds its line on off stump, keeps low, Brathwaite stoops low and blocks it back
pitched up on off stump, poked into the covers
full and straight, clipped away to short midwicket off the front foot
pitched further up at off stump, driven past the right of the bowler for one
full and outside off, Smith covers his off stump and lets it go
just short of a good length and outside off, Smith gets behind the line and punches it away to backward point
full offbreak, hint of turn, driven with the break to long-on
shorter and holds its line outside off, a back-foot punch to long-off ensues
full and spinning into middle and leg, blocked to short leg with soft hands
tossed on off stump, tip and run to the covers
floated up on off stump, Smith presses forward, drives a single to backward point and raises his second fifty in three Tests on return
tossed on off, forward and worked away to short midwicket off the front foot
very full on middle, squeezed out to mid-off without much footwork
overpitched and outside off, free-flowing drive from Smith, the ball, however, plugs in the deep
short ball outside off, but this keeps low and sneaks under the cut
good length on off, pushed up to the covers
Brathwaite shuffles across off stump, gets inside the line of this short ball on off, nudges to Mominul at square leg. He searches for a single, slips, but undoes his steps in time
good length and shaping away in the corridor, Brathwaite judges it well and shoulders arms
good length and sliding into the pads, Smith forces a single down to long-on
flighted just a shade outside off, turned away to short midwicket off the front foot
lobbed up on off, played back to the bowler
nudged with the break to square leg
really full on middle and leg, glanced square again
Brathwaite shuffles across and defends an offbreak to short leg with soft hands
back of a length and swinging down the leg side, past Smith's flick, past Nurul's dive for three
full on middle and leg, worked away to short midwicket
full and outside off, ignored
full and floated down leg
left alone outside off
pitched up and outside off, driven smoothly to mid-off, stretching forward
pushed through on middle, played back
arm ball, finishes on the pads, as Smith misses a flick
shorter offbreak outside off, Smith jumps back and lashes it to point
full on the stumps, slapped back to the bowler's left. He makes a half-save
back of a length and holds its line outside off, punched up to mid-off
another arm ball, snaking in from round the stumps to thud into the pad, but this is slipping down leg with the sharp angle again
good length, starts outside off and swings away further, Brathwaite simply watches it through to the keeper
full on a fourth-stump line, played back to the bowler
full and nipping away outside off, Brathwaite has a stab at it but the ball swings away past the bat en route to the diving keeper
good length and swings away again, beats the on-the-up drive from Brathwaite
overpitched on off, driven to mid-off
overpitched and outside off, driven down the ground. WI keep ticking
tossed on middle, dead-batted away to the leg side
flighted on middle stump, Brathwaite gets forward and works it to the right of short midwicket and left of short leg
nudged away past the right of short leg now
full and holds its line on off, Smith stays leg-side of the ball and punches to point
tossed on a fourth-stump line, eased to the covers off the front foot
here comes Smith: down the track, meets the pitch of a length ball and blasts it away straight of mid-on for four. Muscled away
back of a length and outside off, Javed bowls a heavy ball, left alone
full on a fourth-stump line, tapped to short cover off the front foot
shuffles across and flicks a full ball from middle stump to the right of mid-on. Brathwaite brings up a fifty of his own as WI grow their lead

Maiden Test wicket for Abu Jayed, but this is a loose, loose shot from Smith. Just short of a good length and outside off, Smith simply reaches out for the ball with his hands. He slashes and thickly edges it behind to the keeper. Finally, some respite for Bangladesh
full and curling away outside off, stabbed off the outside half to the covers
Brathwaite gets on top of a short ball outside off, extends his hands, and thumps it on the up through extra cover. Easy peasy
slides on outside off, non-turner, left alone
back of a length and kicks up outside off, slashed away to backward point
dragged down outside off, slapped away to point
patted to the covers
short and spins away outside off, Powell stays leg-side of the ball and nails a square cut
full on the stumps, pushed up to mid-on
full and outside off, Brathwaite closes the face and secures a single to the leg side
back of a length and skidding through outside off to beat the batsman
overpitched and outside off, driven firmly to the left of mid-off for four
squirted to gully off the outside half
on a length and outside off, driven on the up to mid-off
full and outside off, run away to backward point
full and straight, clipped to midwicket
played with soft hands to the left of short leg
tossed on off, dead-batted back to the bowler
glanced with the break to square leg
tossed on middle, worked to short leg
floaty offbreak on middle, Brathwaite defends again and plays out a maiden
full and angling across off, presses forward and drives to mid-off
back of a length on middle, played back to Rubel off the back foot
bouncer on middle, ducks under it does Powell
punched on the up but straight to mid-off
back of a length and angling away outside off, stabbed to backward point
full on the stumps, pushed back to him
tossed just a shade outside off, dabbed wide of slip with soft hands
drifts into middle and leg, dead-batted
drifts in again, beats the flick and catches the pad
picked off the hips behind square on the leg side
tossed on off, defended back
full on middle, blocked to leg
full and skids through on middle, played back to the bowler
full and attacking the stumps, Smith covers up in defence
bouncer, Powell evades it
full and angling away outside off, Powell lets it slide off the face between slips and gully for four. Nicely played
tucked around the corner for one
Brathwaite gets on top of a short ball outside off and punches to extra cover, where Shakib misfields and gives away a single
whipped off the toes to deep midwicket

Mehidy pins Powell lbw. He wins the appeal from umpire Illingworth. But Powell challenges the on-field out decision. Arm ball, slides in from round the stumps, no turn, Powell has managed an inside-edge onto the front pad. He survives
tossed outside off, Powell races down the track, gets close to the pitch, and carts it over extra cover like a boss
on a length and breaks away slightly outside off, eased to the right of backward point
shuffles across and works a length ball with the spin to square leg
dangled up outside off, hit to long-on for one more
full and outside off, Brathwaite swishes his bat out of the way and lets it go
slashed away off the back foot but the man at backward point makes a tumbling save
full and straight, driven to the right of short midwicket
played back to the bowler off the front foot
on a good length on off, played back to the bowler again
back of a length and darted down leg past the flick
short of a length on leg stump, defended with soft hands off the back foot
beaten in flight but manages to get behind the line and block this on the front foot after stepping out outside off
short of a length outside off, defended off the back foot
length ball pushed in flat at off stump. Turned to backward square with a closed face
length on middle stump, flicked to backward square
drilled to the midwicket boundary. Steps out and reaches it this time outside off. Makes enough room for a swing through the line and nails it
full outside off, tapped into the covers off the front foot
length ball in at middle stump, pushed into midwicket off the back foot
good length at off stump, defended back down the pitch
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
short and very wide outside off. Nurul does well to leap one-handed to his right, rising high to take this
bouncer aimed at his ribs. Gets on his toes to cover the bounce and drops it into the pitch with soft hands
length outside off, blocked into the covers
length on off stump, deftly poked in front of mid-off to steal a single
length ball outside off, left alone
short ball outside off, gets his wrists around it as he taps this between point and cover
nicely timed. Full ball slanted across off stump, driven straight to extra cover on the up. Nice flowing drive
length ball on leg stump, flicked to fine leg off the hips
length outside off, defended down the pitch
tossed up outside off. Steps down, meets it on the full and flicks down to long-on
length on leg stump, smothered into the turf off the front foot
short of a length on middle, defended off the back foot
tossed up at leg stump, flicked to short midwicket
length outside off, defended on the front foot
length at middle, blocked
short of a length outside off, left alone
length outside off. Some steep lift off the surface, but defended safely into the off side
length in the corridor, left alone
glorious. Full face of the bat, high elbow and all balance. Powell stands tall to tell this length ball who is boss and punches sweetly between bowler and mid-on
easy this time. Overpitched and down leg side. Shifts his weight into the off and tickles it fine
length ball wide outside off, left alone
length on middle, blocked on the front foot
full on leg stump, flicked to short midwicket
floated up full outside off, drives straight to extra cover
length and skidding straight on at middle stump. Defends very late and right in front of middle

mix up. Powell looked very very out the way he was running, but it's a poor throw from short leg who was running backwards. He had to swivel and throw well. It was tough to do. Brathwaite had dabbed this past him off the back foot and there was hesitation. Powell looked to have heavy feet. The throw ended up at square leg, thankfully for him
steps out and kicks it away. Beaten in flight there and was close to walking past it
full and swinging in late at leg stump. Flicked to square leg
short ball outside off and a nice looking cut to deep point

oh yes! What a shot! He's in the mood. This is fired in full and wide outside off from around the wicket and he's climbed into it on the front foot. Full transfer of weight into the shot and a lovely shape as it fizzes through extra cover
short of a length at leg stump, pushed into the midwicket region with soft hands
full toss on the toes. Leans in and merely flicks the wrists as he makes contact. It's good contact. No one at midwicket and it's far too quick for either mid-on or square leg
length ball shaping in at off stump. Blocked on the front foot, off the inside half of the bat
length ball slides into the hips and he uses the angle to give deep backward square a long sprint to his left

forced to kick it away again! Powell shows his cards early trying to step down. Miraz sees him and fires a faster down leg side. Powell's inner David de Gea comes in as he spreads to keep it from Nurul
short of a length at off, defended late on the back foot
short and wide outside off. Under-edges a cut into the turf
length ball angled in at off stump. Opens the face and gets it past slip
arm ball. Slides away from Brathwaite, but far too short to cause trouble. He stabs it to deep point
tossed up at off stump, driven straight to short extra
full and very wide outside off, left alone
tossed up nicely outside off, blocked solidly
short of a length arm ball, left alone outside off
short of a length skidder just outside off. Hurries him on the cut. It's off the inside half but it's a single at cover
length and pushed flat. Tapped to short midwicket off the back foot
big appeal for lbw but that's going down. If not above the stumps. Nicely flighted from Miraz, who has been on the flatter side today. Draws Brathwaite in and spins one past his inside edge
length and flat at off, defended off the back foot
short and a tad wide outside off, he's not chasing that
short of a length and spinning into the hips. Nudged to deep square off the back foot
length ball outside off, left alone
full outside off, pushed to cover with the turn
draws him forward. Some bounce on that outside off. Shakib decides to give it air too. Manages to keep it down
nearly skids onto the stumps. He's been playing deep in the crease all day, but he should have been forward to this arm ball. Just gets the inside half of the bat on this
tossed up outside off, blocked on the front foot
short and a lot of width, can't beat point with the cut
full and wide outside off, left alone
arm ball, full and headed for off stump. Front foot block
length on leg stump, steps out and drives to long-on
full on leg stump, driven down to long-on
tossed up wide outside off. Expansive drive to deep cover
short of a length outside off, left alone
oh beautiful. After all his struggles picking flight in the last over, it's fully in control this time. Follows the drift, gets to the pitch and drives against the turn to get this past mid-off
length at leg stump, nudged to backward square off the back foot
short on off stump, punched to long-off off the back foot
floated up, short of a length on off stump. Defended off the back foot

dropped at mid-on. Mushfiqur Rahim dives to his right, gets two hands on it but can't hold on. Brathwaite unleashes a woeful shot, beaten in flight and flailing across the line and against the spin. Drags it from wide outside off and nearly loses his wicket as we head into the final 30 minutes
length on off stump, tapped into the covers
length at off stump, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
another strange shot. A front-of-the-hand faster one, nearly yorker length and headed for off stump. But he pushes it down the pitch off the back foot
length ball fired down leg side. Looks to sweep and misses
big appeal not followed by a review as Kettleborough turns this down. Length ball floated down leg and he has missed a flick. Nurul thinks it's caught-behind but it looked to be pad
length on middle stump, flicked to midwicket off the back foot
top edge as he goes hard at this length ball floated down leg side. It sails over leg slip
length at leg stump, soft-handed tickle fine
length ball fired in flat at the legs. Clipped to midwicket
floated up outside off. Flicks it past his partner towards long-on
length at middle stump, pushed through fast. Tapped to midwicket
tossed up at off stump, flicked to long-on
tossed up outside off, blocked on the front foot
hard hands as he leans in against this length ball outside off to defend. Shakib will love more of that
short ball at middle, defended off the back foot

has he got him at slip? He has! Liton Das does superbly to hold on to his right. A superb delivery from Mahmudullah - drifts in at off stump and shoots up as it turns away outside off. Powell's hands get ahead of his body and it's off the edge glove. Liton dives to his right and holds on. he was moving to his left first so it was quite a recovery. Another good Powell start ends prematurely.
length ball in at middle stump, blocked off the front foot
short of a length on off, defended off the back foot
short of a length outside off, tapped to point off the back foot
length and wide outside off, left alone
short of a length and into the pads. Whipped to deep square off the back foot
full and just outside off. Defended into the covers off the front foot
short and wide outside off, easy leave for the nightwatchman
beaten. Loose shot. A pedestrian wide length ball and he hangs his bat out at it, no feet
length ball shaping away, but starting too far outside off. Left alone
hoops back in as he stays back. Good bowling from the debutant. Full and headed for off from the corridor. Manages to block it
beaten. Jayed is getting it to move around, can't tell yet if it's reverse. But it's late. Bishoo playing for the one that comes in this time but this shoots away past the outside edge
length ball at leg stump, defended into the pitch
tossed up outside off, flicked to mid-on
short ball in at leg stump. Looks to defend on the back foot and he's copped one on the index finger of his left hand
good length at off stump, pushed back towards the bowler on the front foot

lobs off the shoulder of the bat but there's no one to take it. To be fair, there usually isn't a fourth gully. Mahmudullah is bowling the perfect pace to get the ball to turn and bounce outside off. Bishoo stabbing away from the body
length outside off, defended with soft hands off the thick outside edge
short of a length wide outside off, left alone
length ball in at off stump, defended solidly into the covers
length ball skidding low and headed menacingly towards off stump. But met with a resolute defence

big inswinger nearly traps him. But he manages to hold his balance and get this flick past square leg. Well, actually, square leg dived over it. Brathwaite was falling over as full ball came in. This Jayed guy knows his reverse swing.
another full inswinger. This one comes into the pads and he's more aware of it. Flicks to fine leg
full outswinger outside off and he blocks into the covers to see out the day
turning offbreak, pitches outside off and breaks down leg, Brathwaite searches for a flick and falls over it
dropped short and wide outside off, Brathwaite skips back and chops it away to sweeper cover
back of a length and skids on outside off, jabbed away to silly point
short and wide outside off, Bishoo goes on the back foot and cracks it straight to backward point
slider wide outside off, Bishoo chooses to shoulder arms to this
Mahmudullah throws it up outside off and gets it to turn away, Bishoo does not get close to the pitch but jabs it away to the off side to round out the over
short, wide outside off, Brathwaite has all the time in the world to rock back and square-cut it away in the gap. Brathwaite moves into the nineties
keeps it short and outside off, punched away, now there's a man at deep point to mop it up
full and angling away outside off, Bishoo gets forward to meet the pitch and pat it away to short cover
back of a length and skipping away outside off, Bishoo hangs back, opens the face, and punches to backward point
short and wide outside off, Bishoo keeps back and flashes a cut to backward point
back of a length and zinging away outside off, close to off, makes Bishoo play and goes past the outside edge
pitches outside off and spins down the leg side as Brathwaite shuffles across and lets it go
tossed up outside off and breaks in on middle, blocked back down the pitch by Brathwaite
lobbed up on off stump, played back to the bowler
whipped with the break square through the leg side off the back foot for a single
full and dips just a shade outside off, dead-batted away to the off side
tossed outside off, full, Bishoo goes low, and drags a sweep to deep midwicket for one
Rabbi runs in hard, hits the pitch harder, finds extra bounce, fended off the chest to the off side. Spliced away
half-volley outside off, Bishoo shelves the drive and lets it go in the channel
full and outside off, Bishoo presses forward, opens the face, drives to the covers
pitched up on a fourth-stump line, pushed up to wide mid-off
another wide half-volley, left alone outside off, again
back of a length, shoots low outside off, Bishoo bottom-edges it behind but dies in front of Nurul
whipped from outside off to deep midwicket with the turn
on a length and outside off, forward and blocked to silly point
sliding outside leg, Bishoo falls over the flick, and misses the shot
dragged short and outside off, chopped off the back foot through extra cover
flighted on middle, played back to Mahmudullah
flatter and quicker on middle and leg, forced off the back foot to short midwicket
bouncer on middle, ducks under it safely
full and angling across off stump, Bishoo pokes at it, does so with soft hands, as the ball rolls to backward point
dug in short and outside off, Bishoo has his eyes locked on the ball before ducking under it
Bishoo gets behind the line of a short ball on middle and defends stoutly to mid-off. Bishoo has shown more application than Bangladesh's batsmen did at any point in the first session
Bishoo rides the bounce of a short ball outside off and lets it to slide away to backward point
full and wide, Bishoo throws his hands at the ball and carves to backward point
spinning down leg, shovelled away to short fine leg off the back foot
tossed on off, dead-batted away
shuffles across and nurdles a full one to square leg
shuffles across again and turns an offbreak to backward square leg
skidder outside off, 91ks, no shot
flighted on middle, forward and driven back to the right of Mahmudullah
shorter and angling away outside off, Bishoo gets right behind the line and blocks competently
back of a length and seaming away outside off, leaves Bishoo and nearly shaves the outside edge
pitched up further outside off, Bishoo rocks forward, driving to the covers, but straight to the fielder
full and outside off, Bishoo reaches out for a drive and picks out cover again
overpitched and outside off, forward and driven to short cover's left
lifter on leg stump, Bishoo ducks under it. Three straight maidens. Decent shift put in by Mahmudullah and Rabbi
non-turner on off stump, Brathwaite stretches out and smothers it
dug in short and outside off, back-foot force to wide mid-on
slower through the air on off stump, Bishoo defends to silly point off the front foot
drifting into the pads, dabbed away to the left of the bowler
short, wide, cracked to cover off the back foot
full on middle, patted to cover again off the front foot

Brathwaite brings up his seventh Test hundred with a four. He eases the helmet off his head and gets a hug from Bishoo. Short and outside off, gets on top of the bounce. Slashed on the up over gully. No protection at deep third man to cut it off. Played, Brathwaite
full and angling in at off stump, Brathwaite gets right behind the line and defends it back to the bowler
full and straight, clipped away straight to short midwicket
good length, slanting in towards off stump from over the wicket, tricks Brathwaite into playing the angle but the ball seams away late to beat the outside edge
back of a length and angling in at top of off stump, jabbed back to the bowler
full and holds its line outside off, Brathwaite simply watches it through to Nurul
tossed on off, played back to the bowler
very full and outside off, Bishoo stretches out and sweeps flat and hard to deep midwicket
full on off, pushed to the covers off the front foot
slides in at off, Brathwaite covers up in defence
short and dared down leg, swatted off the back foot straight to square leg
turns in on off, dead-batted away
turns in on off, played back
tossed up liberally outside off, Bishoo sizes it up and slog-sweeps it up and over midwicket. Bam!
worked across the line to short midwicket off the back foot
full and turns in on middle, defended
some turn and bounce, smothered away
skewed down to long-on off the inside half
inswinging yorker, clipped away square through the leg side for four. Bishoo continues make that 43 all out look a lot worse
pitched up and attacking off stump, squeezed away straight of mid-off
full outswinger, no shot from Brathwaite
full and shapes away outside off, jams a drive to the covers
driven back to the bowler
wide of the crease, angling into a front-foot push to cover

skids off the pitch and beats Bishoo for pace and hits the pad but this seems to be heading down the leg side. Bishoo weathers the lbw shout. Bangladesh decide against a review.Oooh, the tracker shows three reds. Pitched in line and hitting the top of middle and leg
full-toss outside off, jabbed away to the left of short cover
tickled off the pads fine on the leg side for four
tucked around the corner for one
off-stump yorker, dug back to the bowler
clipped off the toes to square leg. Front-foot no-ball
short and wide outside off, Brathwaite chases it and stabs away wide of gully for four
snicked off an inside edge to fine leg for one as Jayed gets the ball to tail into Bishoo
pitched up and angling across off from round the wicket, driven straight of mid-off for one
back of a length and angling across off, defended from the crease
wafted from outside off to backward point
full and angling across off, Bishoo shelves the drive and lets it go
driven through the lint but straight to mid-off
back of a length and angling in at off, dropped defensively to the covers
back of a length and outside off, punched away to mid-off
tucked around the corner for one more
on a length and outside off, Bishoo gets forward and steers the ball between cover and point
full and angling into a flick to short midwicket
bouncer on middle, ducks under it does Bishoo. And that's drinks
length ball swung in at the pads. Stands tall and uses the angle to run this to fine leg
length ball speared in at off stump on a good length. Defended down the pitch
length ball hoops down leg side. Nurul dives to his right to hold on
length ball, outswinger in the corridor. Defended comfortably off the back foot
full inswinger outside off. Stretches out to slice it through point
inswinging yorker outside off. Wants to drive through the off side but this pings to mid-on off the inside half
short of a length just outside off, defended off the back foot
short and wide outside off. Too careful on the attempted cut. Gets it out to cover
length ball hooping in at off stump. Leans in and closes the face for a single at midwicket
short ball at off stump, defended off the back foot

got him! Nicely done from Kamrul. Gets one up at a good length. Some late bend back in at off stump. Bishoo defending for the one that goes on with the angle but loses his off stump. Yet another useful contribution from him though. Is this an opening for Bangladesh?
good length in the corridor. Defended solidly off the back foot
length ball just outside off, defended on the front foot
full and swung in at the stumps. Blocked solidly off the front foot
short of a length outswinger wide outside off. Stabs at it away from the body, gets an under-edge into the pitch
good bouncer. He was looking to get forward and was quickly forced to leave as this went up at his left shoulder
bouncer again. This one goes up with the seam pointed towards slip and swings away from him as he changes his mind about the hook and leaves
length ball outside off, left alone as it swings away
length ball skidding through in the corridor, defended off the back foot
length ball just outside off, blocked on the front foot
good length, just outside off. Blocked solidly on the front foot
sweet. Overpitched ball on the stumps. He stands tall and punches with a high elbow to beat mid-on to his left
loses control of the bat. Overpitched ball outside off and the bat turns as he looks to drive. Trickles through midwicket
full inswinger at middle stump. Mistimed drive to mid-on

squared up as he gets rooted in the crease against this length ball headed for the stumps. A semblance of a plan from Jayed here, he's kept him on the back foot off late. That leg gully is still lurking
full at leg stump, pushed to mid-on off the back foot

dropped at leg gully! Very difficult chance to his right for Liton. It's a length ball on the pads and he's looked to hit it fine with a glance. It's uppish and dying on Liton, low to his right. He can only get one hand on it. Can't hold on though.
overpitched outside off, driven to extra cover off the front foot
short ball outside off, ducks and lets it go
short of a length outside off, left alone
well bowled. Bangs it in at a length in the corridor. It jumps at the batsman and goes past his outside edge as he looks to defend
length ball outside off, left alone
full at leg stump, flicked to mid-on's right
length coming in at middle stump, pushed to mid-on off the front foot

leading edge lands between batsman and bowler! Brathwaite being ruffled here. Length ball lifting up at middle stump and he's closed the face on it too soon. Doesn't know where it is either after it pops up. That bounced up on him
short and wide outside off, cut to deep backward point
short of a length outside off, punched to mid-on off the back foot
length ball skidding outside off, keeps low as he jabs it into the off side
short and wide outside off, cut to point's right
nicely timed. Gets behind the line of this short of a length ball outside off and punches firmly to deep point's right
length ball at leg stump, clipped to mid-on's right off the front foot
length on middle stump, defended from the crease
length ball swinging away outside off, blocked on the front foot
inswinger at a length, coming at middle stump. Chips it towards mid-on. Not close enough to the pitch for the drive that he wants to play
length ball on off stump, blocked on the front foot
bouncer too short, ducks under it easily
short outside off, chopped to deep point
full ball on middle stump, driven back on the bounce to the bowler
he retaliates with a deliberate aerial hook. It's short outside off and he mistimes it to get it over the midiwicket region
bouncer outside off, left alone
short and into the pads. Whipped to deep square. Nice control of that shot
beaten. Unsure which way to look. Hope is shaping for the pull but this jags away in the corridor
length outside off, defended on the front foot
short ball in the corridor, defended on the back foot
misfield allows an easy second. Short ball outside off, deflected to deep point's left with an open face
length ball outside off, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
left alone as another one jumps up in the corridor. Short of a length and he was looking to caress it through point before dropping his wrists
short of a length outside off, pushed to mid-off's left off the back foot
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
short ball outside off, punched through the covers off the back foot. Deep point with work to his right
length ball wide outside off, left alone

troubles him with a bouncer. Brathwaite is wary of trying to get bat on this bouncer. Short leg and leg gully are close. Square leg is back halfway. They have him double-guessing every shot and that draws an aimless fend down leg side. Can't connect on it
full at the stumps, jammed towards mid-on with a turning bat
short and wide and slashed over cover. That popped up nicely off the pitch and Hope didn't even try to keep this down
short of a length outside off, tapped into the covers off the back foot
length on off stump, blocked solidly on the front foot
length ball outside off, leans in and pokes to short leg off the front foot
short of a length outside off, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
length ball wide outside off, left alone
arm ball, wide outside off. Left alone
short and wide outside off, left alone
tossed up at off stump, driven back to the bowler
very full on middle stump, Hope stays leg-side of the ball and squeezes it back to Shakib
tossed on leg stump, laced to long-off for one
non-turner, defended off the front foot on off stump

Shakib strikes with the fourth ball after lunch. Tossed up full outside off, breaks away further, Brathwaite does not meet the pitch. Instead, stabs away from the body, Mehidy Hasan throws himself to his left at short extra cover and completes an excellent low catch
full and drifts in on off, presses forward and taps the ball along the ground to short cover
slides on with the arm outside off, ignored
back of a length and holds its line outside off, punched through the covers
full and breaks in on off, Chase uses his long reach to smother it
opens the face and squirts it through backward point does Chase
short and outside off, rocks back and spanks it to the covers, where there's a half-stop

what a ball from Mehidy Hasan Miraz! Drifts in from wide of the crease, Mehidy tricks the batsman into playing for the incoming angle but the ball turns away late to beat the outside edge and ping the back pad. Not given lbw. Bangladesh choose to challenge the on-field not-out decision. No bat involved. The ball would have crashed into off stump but the impact was outside the line of off. Leg byes as the ball rolls away past the keeper
slides in with the arm on off, dead-batted away
arm ball, darted into the pads of Chase, who whips it with the wrists to long leg
lobbed up on middle, blocked to the off side off the front foot
full on the stumps, driven back to the bowler
dip and turn, the batsman stretches out and jabs back to Shakib
full on middle, hit back to Shakib off the front foot
scooped away to the left of short cover
full and just a shade outside off, played back
sharp turn for Mehidy from outside off, extra bounce to boot, Chase plonks his front foot and gloves it in the air over short leg
Mehidy draws a leading edge with a topspinner, chipped to the bowler's left
short and spins back in to beat the flick and lodge into the thigh pad

another cracker from Mehidy, Chase has been pinned leg before. Umpire Illingworth raises his finger. Arm ball, fizzes in off the pitch, Chase searches for more turn and plays down the wrong line. He eventually wears it on the back pad in line with off. It would have cannoned into middle stump. Mehidy in the middle of a fine spell after lunch
half-volley outside off, very friendly delivery, Dowrich leans into it and drills a drive through the covers
flatter and darted into middle and leg, a back-foot force to mid-on ensues
tossed on leg stump, clears his front leg and drives to long-off
full and holds its line outside off, left alone
drifts in at off stump, prodded to silly point from the crease
drift and turn, catches the outside edge and rolls to backward point
arm ball, chopped to the covers
tossed up on middle, spins in, driven with the break to mid-on hanging back
squirted off the pads to square leg
turn and bounce, off the thigh but lobs to the right of short leg
defended off the front foot to short leg
hacked away to the right of mid-on from outside off
shuffles across and defends a turning offbreak to short leg
full on off, defended to silly point
worked to the right of mid-on
full and outside off, defended
skids in at off, blocked off the front foot
good length and outside off, left alone
left alone outside off again
whipped across the line to square leg
shuffles across and defends a length-ball offbreak to short leg
spinning down leg, Hope sets up for a sweep but misses. Off the pad and lobs behind to the keeper
slides in on off, defended back
down the track and caressed to mid-on
flighted on middle, played back
full on off, defended back again

appeal for a catch at silly point. Shakib thinks he has his man. The on-field umpires converge and refer it to the TV umpire. The soft signal, however, is not out. Another non-turner from Shakib, slides in towards off stump, Dowrich gets forward, prods it onto his front boot, the ball bounces up. The man at short leg dives to his right and plucks a sensational reflex catch. One-hander from Liton, who usually keeps wicket, at silly point. Dowrich has to go
full on middle stump, Holder presses it out to short cover
nudged to leg for one
makes room and drives inside out through the covers
uses his feet and flicks in the air to the right of short midwicket
full on the stumps, chipped in the air in front of the straighter of the two short midwickets
full and outside off, dead-batted
defended back to the bowler
played back to the bowler again
shot, Jason! Pushed through outside off, Holder leans into it and caresses the ball between covers and mid-off. So easy on the eye...
tossed on off stump, played back to the bowler
slides on with the arm outside off, ignored
wristy little drive through the covers for one
muscles a drive to long-off
full and drifts in on middle, played back to Shakib off the front foot
looped up on off, dead-batted away
tossed up, too full on middle, Holder picks it up and smears it over the wide long-on boundary with immense power. What a way to bring up the 300 for WI
prodded in the air but wide of short leg
front-foot defence back to the bowler
full and spins in on off, defended
poked past slip for one
shuffles across and works it to the right of short leg
presses forward and drives to cover
full and drifting into off, defended to silly point with soft hands
short and outside off, forced down the ground for one
tossed outside off, driven to the covers
driven to the left of the covers now for one
short and wide, slapped away behind point off the back foot
good length on middle, defended back
driven off the front foot to mid-off
full on middle, played back to Shakib
chipped in the air to the right of short leg
short and turns in, blocked off the back foot
inside-edged to short leg off the front foot
full on middle, defended back
down the track and belted to left of short cover
defends a full ball on off back to Shakib
driven through the line to sweeper cover
full on middle, defended to cover
forced to short midwicket
skids through on off, blocked to the covers
full on middle, defended back
down the track and pushed back to the bowler
worked to leg with the turn
tossed on middle, dead-batted
length ball skids through and hits Holder on the back thigh as he looks to flick. Lobs up to that gully fielder but there's no bat on this
length ball on off stump, drives inside-out to long-off
floated up full outside off. Completely loses his shape as he looks to crash it through cover. It bounces harmlessly back to the bowler
length on middle stump, whipped to midwicket off the back foot
length ball on leg stump, nicely forward to tickle this past leg slip

sweeetly hit. Hope jumps down, gets leg side of this length ball and slices it straight over the bowler with the turn. Did really well to swivel the hips and go inside-out, because hadn't made it to the pitch
boom. So easy for Holder with that massive reach. Mehidy hits a length outside off but that's in the zone for Holder. Big stride as he clears the long-on fielder with ease
length at off stump, blocked off the front foot
full at middle stump, flicked to straight short midwicket
length outside off, nudged through cover off the front foot
length at the stumps, skips down and flicks to long-on
full on the stumps, driven to long-on
full at middle stump, toe-end drive back to the bowler
full at the stumps again, leans in and drives back to the bowler
full outside off, opens the face and pushes to backward point
generous full toss lobbed wide outside off. Holder reaches and clobbers it between the two catches at extra cover
inside edge and onto back pad. This keeps really low as he looks to defend on the back foot outside off
tossed up wide outside off, driven out to sweeper cover. Off the toe-end
length ball skidding in at off stump. Defended off the back foot
length outside off, blocked into the covers
full on middle, defended down the pitch
length outside off, blocked on the front foot
full on off stump, tapped to short extra cover off the front foot
short of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover

dropped. And you will call me cruel for saying it, because he really had no chance in his follow through. Holder gets down the track and pummels it hard and he stretches low to his right with one hand

gets him next ball. Nothing difficult about this. Holder goes forward and jabs with hard hands as this length ball turns into his pad and carries some extra bounce with it. Ends up poking it straight to short leg
length ball outside off, blocked close to the body off the front foot
short of a length on leg stump and he gets deep in the crease to defend. Close to the body again. Dead-batted to leg slip
length on leg stump, pushed into the leg side off the front foot
length at off stump, blocked on the front foot
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length at middle, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
length ball in at leg stump, into his thigh guard before dying in front short leg
length ball skidding in at leg stump, big inside edge to short fine as he looks to defend on the front foot
tossed up at off stump, dead-batted on the front foot
short of a length on middle stump, pushed into the turf off the back foot
flat length ball straightens as he goes back and plays for the turn. Just keeps it out with a late adjustment of the hands
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
tossed up at leg stump, steps out and flicks to long-on
length ball down leg side. Swats at it and can't connect
short of a length on off stump, defended on the back foot
length outside off, pushed into the covers off the front foot
beaten in flight and he gets a big outside edge. Shakib draws him forward and has him jabbing in front ofthe body. Lands safely in front of point
top edge as he looks to sweep now. Slow, tantalising length ball on middle stump. He's completely mistimed that
length outside off, left alone
short and wide and clobbered! Don't even need a knee to hit that. Nice and juicy outside off and he picks up easy runs
length on off stump, nice forward stride to defend
tossed up at middle stump, pushed down the pitch off the front foot
short of a length at leg stump, punched towards long-on but short midwicket won't let it pass
full on middle, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, defended off the back foot. This skidded straight on
goes the other way, but it's short. Defended comfortably off the back foot
full on leg stump, driven to long-on
short of a length and turning away, short-arm whip to midwicket off the back foot
short on off stump, pushed off the back foot
length on off stump, soft-handed block on the front foot
tossed up at off stump, blocked on the front foot
length on leg stump, trickles past short leg off the inside edge as he looks to defend. Skids through from Shakib
short of a length at leg stump, whipped past short leg off the back foot
length at leg stump, flicked to deep square off the back foot
so simple. Full ball outside off. Half a stride and launched over the bowler. Big gap between bat and pad as he does this, but he's reached it
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
as if he needed to assert himself any more on this Test! Roach has leathered this through extra cover. Full drifting ball wide outside off and he has made no effort to be respectful about this drive
short of a length and fended away with the high part of the bat as this climbs up on his back foot defence
length on leg stump, defended to short leg
short of a length at leg stump, flicked into short leg off the back foot
tossed up outside off, leans in and drives to sweeper cover
tossed up at off stump, driven to extra cover
length on leg stump, defended into the leg side off the front foot
pick up over deep square and the wind carries it over. Full ball on leg stump and he swings cleanly, but not necessarily with full power. Gets it in front of square and over the rope
more forceful this time. Deep square leg moved straighter and Roach swats this full ball exactly where he was a moment ago
short of a length at middle stump, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
short and in at the body. Defended off the back foot
short at off stump, punched to extra cover off the back foot
tickled fine. Short and spinning into the hips. Allows it to come in and places it behind square
full outside off, blocked on the front foot
short of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
length ball on middle stump, blocked on the front foot
shot. Leans in nicely to drive to sweeper cover
tossed up outside off, driven to long-off
short of a length outside off, defended off the back foot
floated up at off stump, driven to long-off
short ball outside off. Defended off the back foot
length on middle stump, punched to long-on and that is his fifty. He's needed this, been a bit fry for him lately
arm ball outside off, tapped back to the bowler off the back foot
short and into the pads. Lobs up to short leg but there's no bat involved
short ball spinning down leg side. Big appeal as Roach looks to flick and misses. They think there's something. Replays don't suggest they're right
short ball down leg side, swivels and looks to pull. Can't connect as it goes down leg side
length ball down leg side. Swats it and gets it out to deep square on the bounce
good length, skids back in from extra bounce and socks the glove as Roach looks to fend it off
full and slanting down leg side, off the pad and through to the diving keeper down the leg side
pitched up on off, driven back, the bowler stops it with his left boot
good length and angling into off stump, Roach hangs back and pushes the ball to the covers
overpitched on off, belted back to Jayed
back of a length and slanting in at off stump, Roach hops and fends to the leg side
full and spins in, blocked solidly
uses his feet and defends a length ball on off back to Miraz
pushed through on off, the batsman covers the line and defends it
darted shorter and outside off, punched through the cover-point region
nearly rips off the glove. Bursts off a length outside off and spins in to smack the glove
back of a length on off, Roach answers with a back-foot defensive

Dropped by Liton at gully. On a length and angling in, bursts off a length, catches the batsman in a tangle. He looks away and fends it in the air off the glove. Liton runs in. The ball goes straight in and straight out
full and angling into a forward-defensive on off
full on middle, tapped to mid-on
short and angling into the body, Hope swivels on the back foot and controls a pull behind square. Lovely timing from Hope
back of a length and angling in to hit the splice as Hope defends back down the pitch
clipped off the pads to deep midwicket for a comfortable single
full and outside off, a jabbing drive to short cover ensues
dropped short and outside off, carted away wide of sweeper cover
tossed on off, stretches out and smothers it does Hope
full and outside off, shovelled with the wrists to the left of long-on
on a length and holds its line outside off, flayed on the up to cover
full, starts outside off, spins back in, inside-edged onto the front foot
Hope stands up tall to a short ball outside off and serenely punches behind point
full inducker, Roach prods at it and inside-edges the ball onto the thigh
back of a length and cuts back in from outside off, Roach jumps across off, closes the face, and fends the ball away to the leg side, adjacent to the pitch
very full and angling down the leg side, away from the reach of the flick
good length and coming in with the angle from over the wicket, the batsman shuffles across and takes it on the pad but this seems to be heading down leg
Roach gets on top of a short ball outside off and cracks it away past gully for four
full and straight, whipped to deep midwicket
floated up on middle, Roach goes over the top and lustily clubs it over midwicket
slider, Roach jams his bat down and keeps it out
Mehidy traps Roach in front. This looks adjacent and hence Roach doesn't review. Full, straighter one on middle, Roach dares to sweep and does not make contact. Roach's fun with the bat is over
full on middle, Cummins bends forward in defence
flat and on the pads, dead-batted away
back of a length and outside off, Hope shimmies out and flays it to the covers. Straight to the fielder there
on a length and around off, Hope opens the face and dinks the ball away to point
full and ducks back in at off stump, jammed to the covers
wide yorker, squirted away behind square off an inside edge
full on middle, blocked back to Jayed
full and angling across off stump, Cummins lets it go
back of a length and turns in, punched back to Miraz
fired outside off, stabbed to mid-off from the crease
stabbed away to the right of short cover, down to long-off now off the front foot
dipping full-toss on leg stump, pushed back to Miraz's left
slides in from round the stumps to hit the pad as Cummins plays down wrong line. Drifting down leg, though
prodded to the right of short leg after inching forward to meet this full ball
overpitched and outside off, blasted through the line, the man at covers dives to his left but the ball bursts through his hands
on a length and outside off, driven on the up to the covers
Hope plays around his front pad and flicks a full ball past the right of short midwicket for a brace. 400 up for WI
Hope holes out to Tamim at long leg. Hope shimmies out, Jayed bangs this one into the middle of the pitch and cramps the batsman for room. The top edge sails to Tamim in the deep
good length and on off stump, forward and played back to the bowler
on a length and outside off, slapped over the bowler's head as the ball plugs in the deep
full at off, dead-batted
defended to the covers off the front foot
Cummins drags a short ball from outside off to long-on to get off the mark after 10 balls
fullish and outside off, hacked down to long-on for one
biting offbreak outside off, beats the outside edge as Cummins hangs his bat out
floater just a shade outside off, blocked off the front foot
on a length and outside off, Gabriel kerplunks it away to the right of mid-on off the inside half
short and slanting into a push to short midwicket

Gabriel slogs to the leg side, and winds up skying a catch to backward point. Good length and holds its line outside off, Gabriel hoicks across the line, loses his shape and holes out. Replays indicate this was the back-of-the-hand slower one and Gabriel was waaaaaay too early into his leg-side wallop
back of a length on middle, blocked
back of a length and seaming away just a shade outside off, poked back
Tamim plays inside the line and lets it go outside off
prodded to the covers. There's a mix-up between the wickets but Liton undoes his steps in time
glanced off the hips to fine leg
gloved behind to the keeper as Holder uses his height and gets extra bounce
short at the body, fended to mid-on
stabbed away from the body to point
clipped past short leg for a double
back of a length and angling into a back-foot block
good length and nipping away outside off, left alone
flicked out to long leg off the pads
jabbed away from the body to gully
Liton gets behind the line of this full one on off and defends
lifter outside off, Liton ducks under it and lets it fly through to Dowrich
back of a length and floated down the leg side, left alone
left alone outside off
good length outswinger, no shot again
Tamim closes the face and watches an outside edge streak away wide of point for four
off-side wide in Test cricket. Re-set the radar, Shannon
back of a length, angling away and bouncing past the outside edge
short, wide, smashed past point. Tamim passes 4000 Test runs

Gabriel has Tamim caught at gully. No celebration at all from Gabriel. Fuller than a good length, bouncing and bending away outside off, Tamim inches forward, the ball lobs off the shoulder of the bat to Hope, who makes the catch look easy
back of a length and curls away outside off, ignored in the channel
Gabriel bursts through the defences of Mominul. Back of a length, skids back in from around the stumps, shoots low,  and the off stump takes a beating
back of a length and shaping away outside off, ignored
Liton gets behind the line of this shortish ball on off and defends
Liton lets this length ball go outside off
pitched up on off, driven off the front foot to the left of short cover
back of a length and outside off, Liton drops his wrists and lets it pass
full on a fifth-stump line, Liton watches it through to Dowrich
back of a length and angling down leg as Mushfiqur does not connect with a flick
nice and full, tailing in, Mushfiqur may have got an inside edge onto the pad
short and darts back in, Mushfiqur takes a blow on the body
short and angling in to hit the splice
Gabriel angles one it and gets it to veer away past the loose poke of Mushfiqur
full and outside off, stabbed back
outswinger, short of a length in the corridor. Defended towards point with an open face
length ball swinging away late in the corridor. Nice stride to cover the off stump to leave this
short of a length with curve away from the corridor. Left alone

gets him at first slip! Top class bowling from Holder! He's been swinging it away late from the corridor and Liton's been patient. Until then. He left the last three, but Holder goes marginally wide this time to create an angle into him and induce a stab outside off. The front foot hasn't even landed as the ball takes the outside edge and loops at the fielder who takes it in front of his thighs
length ball on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length ball angled across off stump. Leans in and taps on the up to mid-off's right
good length and just outside off. Drives on the up to mid-off

outside edge flies over Dowrich! Shakib close to being the fourth wicket. Short ball rising in the corridor is too close for the cut. Too quick too. Luckily for him, the pace doesn't give the keeper a chance
slashes and is beaten. Another ordinary shot attempted. Short and wide and some shape away. Not close to connecting on that
punched through cover. Length ball on off stump. Not a convincing forward movement, but he doesn't go hard at this. Keeps his balance and opens the face
